title: Bug 29252Accelerators are not disabled when the toolbars and menus are on GTK
description: When the toolbars and menus are disabled in the UI due to a UI blockingoperation being run the accelerators are still active.STEPS1) Open a java editor2) Save it using CtrlS  the menu and toolbars are disabled3) Hit CtrlB (the build) while the menu bars are disabled  this will getserviced even though the UI should not be accepting events.
